00042 #ifndef __TIMEWARPER__
00043 #define __TIMEWARPER__
00044 
00045 class TimeWarper
00046 {
00047 public:
00048    virtual ~TimeWarper() { }
00049    virtual double Warp(double originalTime) const = 0;
00050 };
00051 
00052 class IdentityTimeWarper : public TimeWarper
00053 {
00054 public:
00055    virtual double Warp(double originalTime) const;
00056 };
00057 
00058 class ShiftTimeWarper : public TimeWarper
00059 {
00060 private:
00061    TimeWarper *mWarper;
00062    double mShift;
00063 public:
00064    ShiftTimeWarper(TimeWarper *warper, double shiftAmount)
00065       : mWarper(warper), mShift(shiftAmount) { }
00066    virtual ~ShiftTimeWarper()
00067    { delete mWarper; }
00068    virtual double Warp(double originalTime) const;
00069 };
00070 
00071 class LinearTimeWarper : public TimeWarper
00072 {
00073 private:
00074    double mScale;
00075    double mShift;
00076 public:
00077    LinearTimeWarper(double tBefore0, double tAfter0,
00078                     double tBefore1, double tAfter1)
00079       : mScale((tAfter1 - tAfter0)/(tBefore1 - tBefore0)),
00080         mShift(tAfter0 - mScale*tBefore0)
00081    { }
00082    virtual double Warp(double originalTime) const;
00083 };
00084 
00085 class LogarithmicTimeWarper : public TimeWarper
00086 {
00087 private:
00088    LinearTimeWarper mRateWarper;
00089    double mRStart;
00090    double mTStart;
00091    double mScale;
00092 public:
00093    LogarithmicTimeWarper(double tStart, double tEnd,
00094                          double rStart, double rEnd);
00095    virtual double Warp(double originalTime) const;
00096 };
00097 
00098 class StepTimeWarper : public TimeWarper
00099 {
00100 private:
00101    double mTStep;
00102    double mOffset;
00103 public:
00104    StepTimeWarper(double tStep, double offset);
00105    virtual double Warp(double originalTime) const;
00106 };
00107 
00108 
00109 // Note: this assumes that tStart is a fixed point of warper->warp()
00110 class RegionTimeWarper : public TimeWarper
00111 {
00112 private:
00113    TimeWarper *mWarper;
00114    double mTStart;
00115    double mTEnd;
00116    double mOffset;
00117 public:
00118    RegionTimeWarper(double tStart, double tEnd, TimeWarper *warper)
00119       : mWarper(warper), mTStart(tStart), mTEnd(tEnd),
00120          mOffset(mWarper->Warp(mTEnd)-mTEnd)
00121    { }
00122    virtual ~RegionTimeWarper()
00123    { delete mWarper; }
00124    virtual double Warp(double originalTime) const
00125    {
00126       if (originalTime < mTStart)
00127       {
00128          return originalTime;
00129       } else if (originalTime < mTEnd)
00130       {
00131          return mWarper->Warp(originalTime);
00132       } else
00133       {
00134          return mOffset + originalTime;
00135       }
00136    }
00137 };
00138 
00139 #endif /* End of include guard: __TIMEWARPER__ */
